documentation.description: Generates a configuration file for Borgmatic based on questions

Generates Borgmatic configuration to backup a semantic.works application.
backup-server-ssh-connection: user@backup-host:port (e.g. u339567-sub1@u339567.your-storagebox.de:23)
server-hostname: hostname of the server to backup (e.g. abb-croco)
app-name: name of the app to backup (e.g. app-mandatendatabank)
